name: henrikbjorn/bernard
description: Message queue implemented in PHP with Redis as a backend.

suggest.ext-redis: Native redis extension for php if you want to use PhpRedisConnection
suggest.predis/predis: PHP implementation for redis support if you want to use PredisConnection
suggest.jms/serializer: Powerful serialization library. If you already use this or have advanced needs
suggest.symfony/serializer: Simple serialization if you dont have advanced needs. Easy to get started
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Amazon PHP SDK, including SQS API client
